content.full_text: Certificate of Discharge for Nathan Drake, 24 July 18321 I do hereby certify thatNathan Drakevolunteered and served as a private in the Company which I commanded— in theregimentcommanded by. ColonelSamuel M. Thompson— of the Brigade commanded by Brigadier GeneralSamuel Whitesides— in an expedition directed against theSac&FoxIndians—and that he was enrolled on the 29thday of April & discharged on the 9th2day of June 1832— having served forty and two thirds-days— given under my hand this24thJuly 1832—
paragraphs: Certificate of Discharge for Nathan Drake, 24 July 18321 I do hereby certify thatNathan Drakevolunteered and served as a private in the Company which I commanded— in theregimentcommanded by. ColonelSamuel M.

Thompson— of the Brigade commanded by Brigadier GeneralSamuel Whitesides— in an expedition directed against theSac&FoxIndians—and that he was enrolled on the 29thday of April & discharged on the 9th2day of June 1832— having served forty and two thirds-days— given under my hand this24thJuly 1832—
citations: Muster Roll of Abraham Lincoln’s Company of Mounted Volunteers;Muster Roll of Captain Elijah Iles’ Company of Mounted Volunteers;Muster Roll of Captain Jacob M. Early’s Company of Mounted Volunteers; Ellen M. Whitney, comp.,The Black Hawk War, 1831-1832: Illinois Volunteers, vol. 35 ofCollections of the Illinois State Historical Library(Springfield: Illinois State Historical Library, 1970), 1:176-78, 227-30, 544-46.

structured_content.text: Certificate of Discharge for Nathan Drake, 24 July 18321

I do hereby certify thatNathan Drakevolunteered and served as a private in the Company which I commanded— in theregimentcommanded by. ColonelSamuel M. Thompson— of the Brigade commanded by Brigadier GeneralSamuel Whitesides— in an expedition directed against theSac&FoxIndians—and that he was enrolled on the 29thday of April & discharged on the 9th2day of June 1832— having served forty and two thirds-days— given under my hand this24thJuly 1832—
